00014 namespace BulletHell.System
00015 {
00016     /* To use this class, the keyboardState and previousKeyboardState has to be updated in the game state. */
00017     public class InputHandler
00018     {
00019         #region Fields
00020         public KeyboardState keyboardState;
00021         public KeyboardState previousKeyboardState;
00022         //private GamePadState gamepadState;
00023 
00024         public Keys up, down, left, right, okay, escape, pause;
00025         #endregion
00026 
00027         #region Initialization
00028         public InputHandler()
00029         {
00030             keyboardState = new KeyboardState();
00031             previousKeyboardState = new KeyboardState();
00032 
00033             up = Keys.Up;
00034             down = Keys.Down;
00035             left = Keys.Left;
00036             right = Keys.Right;
00037             okay = Keys.Enter;
00038             escape = Keys.Escape;
00039             pause = Keys.P;
00040         }
00041 
00042         #endregion
00043 
00044         #region Methods
00045         public void Update(GameTime gameTime) {
00046             /* These two statement has been disable because they have proven themselves to be not efficient */
00047 
00048             //_GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState = Keyboard.GetState(); 
00049             //_GLOBAL.InputHandler.previousKeyboardState = _GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState;
00050         }
00051 
00052         public bool isKeyDown()
00053         {
00054             return previousKeyboardState.IsKeyDown(down)
00055                 && keyboardState.IsKeyUp(down);
00056         }
00057 
00058         public bool isKeyDownPressed()
00059         {
00060             return keyboardState.IsKeyDown(down);
00061         }
00062 
00063         public bool isKeyUp()
00064         {
00065             return previousKeyboardState.IsKeyDown(up)
00066                 && keyboardState.IsKeyUp(up);
00067         }
00068 
00069         public bool isKeyUpPressed()
00070         {
00071             return keyboardState.IsKeyDown(up);
00072         }
00073 
00074         public bool isKeyLeft()
00075         {
00076             return previousKeyboardState.IsKeyDown(left)
00077                 && keyboardState.IsKeyUp(left);
00078         }
00079 
00080         public bool isKeyLeftPressed()
00081         {
00082             return keyboardState.IsKeyDown(left);
00083         }
00084 
00085         public bool isKeyRight()
00086         {
00087             return previousKeyboardState.IsKeyDown(right)
00088                 && keyboardState.IsKeyUp(right);
00089         }
00090 
00091         public bool isKeyRightPressed()
00092         {
00093             return keyboardState.IsKeyDown(right);
00094         }
00095 
00096         public bool isKeyEnter()
00097         {
00098             return keyboardState.IsKeyDown(Keys.Enter) && previousKeyboardState.IsKeyUp(Keys.Enter);
00099         }
00100 
00101         public bool isKeyEnterPressed()
00102         {
00103             return keyboardState.IsKeyDown(okay);
00104         }
00105 
00106         public bool isKeyEscape()
00107         {
00108             return previousKeyboardState.IsKeyDown(escape)
00109                 && keyboardState.IsKeyUp(escape);
00110         }
00111 
00112         public bool isKeyPause()
00113         {
00114             return previousKeyboardState.IsKeyDown(pause)
00115                 && keyboardState.IsKeyUp(pause);
00116         }
